sec.label: C.5
sec.title: Uncertainty of measurements
sec.p: The total uncertainty of the sound power level and emission sound pressure level at workstation of machines covered by this document is 3 dB for non-percussive operation or 6 dB for impact/percussive operation. Alternatively, manufacturers may use lower values if these can be substantiated by testing (see ISO 3744:2010, Clause 9 and H.3, and ISO 11201:2010, Clause 9 and A.3).

non-normative-note.label: NOTE
non-normative-note.p: These values include uncertainty due to measurement, operation of equipment and production variances. These values are based on a coverage factor of 2.
